title: Ariat Men's Rebar M4 Relaxed Durastretch Workhorse Boot Cut Jean
description: Relaxed through waist, hip and thigh
ToughMax fabric provides the ultimate in comfort and 2X more durability

The Rebar M4 Low Rise DuraStretch Workhorse Boot Cut Jeans by Ariat are designed for men and can keep up with your active lifestyle. Wear them to the workplace or out on the weekend, these jeans can handle everything with ease. They feature a design that is low rise and relaxed through the waist, hip, and thigh. With a boot cut design, these work jeans are durable and sure to create an authentic style statement. They are made with a fabric blend of cotton, poly, spandex. The Workhorse jeans are styled with anchored belt loops, flat hammer loop, extra deep front pockets, and utility pockets. Available in different sizes, you can team up this pair of jeans with your favorite T-shirt and boots to create a perfect work ensemble.
